001
002package com.commercetools.money;
003
004import java.math.BigDecimal;
005
006import javax.money.CurrencyUnit;
007import javax.money.MonetaryAmount;
008
009import org.javamoney.moneta.FastMoney;
010
011/**
012 * MonetaryProvider which uses the FastMoney implementation. Used as default provider
013 */
014public class FastMoneyProvider implements MonetaryProvider {
015    @Override
016    public MonetaryAmount asMonetaryAmount(final long amount, final long fractionDigits, final String currencyCode) {
017        return FastMoney.of(amount / Math.pow(10, fractionDigits), currencyCode);
018    }
019
020    @Override
021    public MonetaryAmount asMonetaryAmount(final long amount, final long fractionDigits,
022            final CurrencyUnit currencyCode) {
023        return FastMoney.of(amount / Math.pow(10, fractionDigits), currencyCode);
024    }
025
026    @Override
027    public MonetaryAmount asMonetaryAmount(final double amount, final CurrencyUnit currencyCode) {
028        return FastMoney.of(amount, currencyCode);
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public MonetaryAmount asMonetaryAmount(final BigDecimal amount, final CurrencyUnit currencyCode) {
033        return FastMoney.of(amount, currencyCode);
034    }
035}
